title: Magic Hat
summaries: The Magic Hat is an armor item that can be equipped in the helmet slot. It increases the player's magic damage and critical strike chance by 6% / 7% each, and grants 2 additional defense. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 3.
The Magic Hat is part of the Wizard set, which further consists of a Mystic Robe or any gem-augmented Robe. It provides a set bonus of +60 mana. The Wizard Hat is an alternative for the helmet slot.
